sense.gloss: to understand, to grasp, to take in, to catch on, to learn
to be filled with (people), to contain
to swallow (one's words), to suppress (a yawn, tears, etc.), to stifle, to hold back

sdata.j: このミシンのこつを|のみ↑込↑↓こ↓む|のに、どのくらい↑時間↑↓じかん↓がかかるのか。
sdata.e: How long does it take to get the hang of this sewing machine?

sdata.j: ↑食↑↓た↓べ↑物↑↓もの↓は↑飲↑↓|の↓み↑込↑↓こ↓む|↑前↑↓まえ↓にかまなければならない。
sdata.e: Food should be chewed before being swallowed.

sdata.j: ↑食↑↓た↓べ↑物↑↓もの↓を↑飲↑↓|の↓み↑込↑↓こ↓む|とのどが↑痛↑↓いた↓みます。
sdata.e: My throat hurts when I swallow.

sdata.j: ↑歯↑↓は↓を↑食↑↓く↓い↑縛↑↓しば↓る、↑喉元↑↓のどもと↓までせりあがった↑感情↑↓かんじょう↓を↑強引↑↓ごういん↓に↑飲↑↓|の↓み↑込↑↓こ↓む|。
sdata.e: He grits his teeth and forces back his growing fear.
